```{r setup}
library(rstapDP)
library(rbenvo)
```

## STAP


```{r fit}
fit <- fdp_staplm(BMI ~ sex + sap(FFR),
                  benvo = FFR_benvo,
                  alpha_a = 1, 
                  alpha_b = 1,
                  tau_df = 2,
                  K = 5,
                  iter_max = 30,
                  burn_in = 15,
                  thin = 2,
                  seed = 43431)
```


```{r ppcs}
ppc(fit)
```


```{r pairs}
plot_pairs(fit)
```


```{r effects}
plot_cluster_effects(fit)
```
